name: Don't let them DIE (Yiokse)
description:
Did you forget to water your plants again ?

Water your plants before they die in this short and timed puzzle-platformer.

But be careful not to spill the water.

Game Design, Art  -  Yona Rivet (Instagram)

Audio  -  Frédéric Kukovicic (Instagram)

My very first little game, created to learn.

(And I'm still learning so there might be some bugs.)

Please enjoy !
